info.name: Vedika Intelligence API
info.description:
Complete Vedika API collection with 247 endpoints for Vedic & Western astrology calculations, AI astrologer, numerology, and more.

## Getting Started

1. **Sandbox (Free)**: 60 FREE sandbox endpoints — no API key required! See the "Sandbox" folder.
2. **Production**: Get your API key from https://vedika.io/console

## Base URLs

- **Sandbox**: `https://api.vedika.io/sandbox` (free, mock data)
- **V2 Vedic**: `https://api.vedika.io/v2/astrology` (production, paid)
- **V2 Western**: `https://api.vedika.io/v2/western` (production, paid)

## Authentication

For production endpoints, add your API key:
```
X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY
```

Sandbox endpoints require NO authentication.

## Pricing

- V2 Vedic: $0.012 - $0.092 per call
- V2 Western: $0.020 - $0.092 per call
- See /v2/astrology/pricing for full price list

## Support

- Documentation: https://vedika.io/docs
- Email: support@vedika.io

variable.description: Your Vedika API key (get from https://vedika.io/console). Format: vk_live_xxxx

item.name: Quickstart
item.description: Start here! Try these sandbox endpoints first — no API key needed.

request.description: Check API health and status. No API key required.
Get daily horoscope for a zodiac sign. No API key required.
Generate a Vedic birth chart (Kundali). No API key required.
Ask the AI astrologer any astrology question. No API key required.
Get today's complete Panchang (Hindu calendar). No API key required.

item.name: V1 AI Chat (Swarm Intelligence)
item.description: Natural language astrology powered by 6-agent swarm. White-label customization (systemPrompt, assistantName, signOff) requires Enterprise plan.

request.description: Main AI endpoint. 6 specialized agents analyze the question using the birth chart. Response time: 15-25 seconds. Pricing: $0.19 (simple) / $0.35 (standard) / $0.65 (complex).

Same as AI Query but with white-label customization. systemPrompt overrides the AI personality, assistantName replaces 'Vedika' in responses, signOff appends to the end. Requires Enterprise plan ($240/mo).
Follow-up query using conversationId from a previous response. The AI remembers prior context and builds on its earlier analysis.
Server-Sent Events streaming via GET. Pass query params: question, datetime, latitude, longitude, timezone. Response streams progressively.
POST streaming with white-label support (Enterprise plan only). Real-time SSE with systemPrompt, assistantName, and signOff in the body.

item.name: V2 Vedic — Charts & Kundli
item.description:
Birth chart, planetary positions, and Kundli calculations.

Base: `https://api.vedika.io/v2/astrology`
Auth: `X-API-Key` header required.

request.description: Generate a Vedic birth chart with all planetary positions. Price: $0.016
Full Kundli with houses, yogas, and doshas. Price: $0.028
Birth analysis with moon sign, nakshatra, and key details. Price: $0.016
Individual planet positions — sign, degree, retrograde, nakshatra pada. Price: $0.016
Calculate house cusp degrees for all 12 houses. Price: $0.016
Calculate the ascendant (Lagna) sign and degree. Price: $0.012

item.name: V2 Vedic — Panchang
item.description:
Hindu calendar elements — Tithi, Nakshatra, Yoga, Karana.

GET endpoints use query params. POST endpoints use JSON body.

request.description: Today's complete Panchang with Tithi, Nakshatra, Yoga, Karana. Price: $0.012
Panchang for a specific date. Price: $0.012
Full Panchang via POST with birth details. Price: $0.016

item.name: V2 Vedic — Dasha Periods
item.description: Vimshottari and Yogini Dasha calculations.

request.description: Full Vimshottari Dasha system with all periods. Price: $0.040
Current and upcoming Dasha periods. Price: $0.028

item.name: V2 Vedic — Doshas
item.description: Dosha (affliction) detection — Mangal, Kaal Sarp, Pitru, Nadi.

request.description: Check Mangal (Mars) Dosha and its severity. Price: $0.028
Check Kaal Sarp Dosha — Rahu-Ketu hemming. Price: $0.028
Check Nadi Dosha for marriage compatibility. Price: $0.028

item.name: V2 Vedic — Matching & Compatibility
item.description:
Marriage compatibility analysis — Guna Milan, Kundali Matching, Porutham.

Body requires `male` and `female` birth details.

request.description: 36 Guna (Ashtakoot) matching for marriage compatibility. Price: $0.048
Full Kundali matching with detailed analysis. Price: $0.048

item.name: V2 Vedic — Muhurta (Auspicious Times)
item.description:
Muhurta timing endpoints — Choghadiya, Hora, Rahu Kaal, etc.

GET endpoints use query params (date, latitude, longitude). POST endpoints use JSON body.

request.description: Choghadiya time periods for a date. Price: $0.012

Find auspicious muhurta for an activity. Price: $0.028

item.description: Planetary strength and relationship calculations.

request.description: Moon's strength from its natal position. Important for muhurta. Price: $0.012
Birth nakshatra vs transit nakshatra compatibility. Price: $0.012

item.name: V2 Vedic — Predictions
item.description:
Horoscope predictions — daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly.

Provide either `rashi` (sign name) or birth details (datetime, latitude, longitude).

item.name: V2 Vedic — Divisional Charts (Varga)
item.description:
16 divisional charts (D2 to D60) for detailed life area analysis.

All require birth details in POST body. Price: $0.028 each.

request.description: D9 chart — marriage, dharma, spiritual life. Price: $0.028
D10 chart — career, profession, status. Price: $0.028
D60 chart — past life karma. Price: $0.028
Generic endpoint — specify chart_type (D2-D60) in body. Price: $0.028

item.name: Sandbox (Free — No API Key)
item.description:
60 FREE sandbox endpoints with mock data. No API key required!

Base: `https://api.vedika.io/sandbox`

Returns mock data for development testing. Use V2 endpoints for real calculations.
